Text: Can you help me out? For some reason I can never open "FoV" files..nevermind if it's mp4 or avi or mkv or whatever..if it's a FoV - no go. Unsupported file. Do you know a way around that?

same in my case...there is problem with codec they use and my TV wont play this.

You can watch it on your PC ..just install some of free codec packs like K-lite, codec all-in-one, win codec pack etc.
Always try VLC... or use Factory Format and convert it to whatever you want.
